explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a data-driven intelligent learning model used in the iTrade system, which implies the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The use of Support Vector Machine (SVM) and other data mining techniques suggests that supervised learning methods are employed for stock trading analysis.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Support Vector Machine (SVM) as one of the technologies in the iTrade system.
